snippet: Shares of Dell rose sharply on Monday after an analyst at Goldman Sachs upgraded the stock - and mused about the possibility of a leveraged buyout in the computer maker's future.
abstract: Shares of Dell rose sharply on Monday after an analyst at Goldman Sachs upgraded the stock - and mused about the possibility of a leveraged buyout in the computer maker's future.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Dell Shares Leap After Analyst Muses About a Buyout
